懬懬懬

懬字的基本解释

懬
kuàng
广阔；广大。
怨恨。
古通“旷”，空。

懬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuàng］
“曠1”的古字。
空，空缺。

懬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懬； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页407第27
【唐韻】【集韻】?苦謗切，音曠。【說文】闊也。从心从廣，廣亦聲。一曰廣也，大也。一曰寬也。　又虛也。【前漢·元帝紀】衆僚久懬。　又【廣韻】苦朗切【集韻】口朗切【韻會】【正韻】苦廣切，?音忼。大也。　又【廣韻】丘晃切【集韻】【韻會】苦晃切，?音䡉。又【集韻】古晃切，音廣。義?同。

懬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懬字的起名意思

暂无。

懬
Basic explanation of words
懬
kuàng
Vast; vast.
resentment.
Gu Tong is "open" and empty.
懬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuàng］
The ancient character of "Kuang 1".
Vacancy, vacancy.
懬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懬; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 407-27
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hard to slander, and the sound is open. [Said the text] Kuo also. From the heart to the broad, the broad is also the sound. One said Guang Ye, Da Ye. One said wide.　It's empty again. [Pre-Han·Yuan Emperor Ji] All the bureaucrats have a long time.　[Guang Yun] bitter and long cut [Jiyun] Kou Lang cut [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] bitter and wide cut,? Yin Yu. Big too.　[Guangyun] Qiu Huangqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] bitterly Huangqie,? Yin. Also [Jiyun] Ancient Huang cuts, the sound is wide. Righteous? Same.
懬
